actions.text: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported by Senator Murkowski under authority of the order of the Senate of 09/28/2000 without amendment. With written report No. 106-442.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 887.
Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.
Message on Senate action sent to the House.

official_title: A bill to designate certain land of the National Forest System located in the State of Virginia as wilderness.

summary.text: Virginia Wilderness Act of 2000 - Designates certain lands in the George Washington National Forest, Virginia, as the Priest Wilderness Area and the Three Ridges Wilderness Area.

titles.title: A bill to designate certain land of the National Forest System located in the State of Virginia as wilderness.
